name: Questery
description: Immerse yourself in a beautiful world that will hold you with interesting tasks, an exciting storyline that will not let you go for a second. This can only exist in Questery!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/8.1/10 x64 Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD 2.5 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/8.1/10 x64 Processor: (4 * 2500) or AMD A10-5Intel Core2 Quad Q9300 800K APU (4*3800) or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 460 (1024 MB) or Radeon HD 7770 (1024 MB) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
